summary: An eccentric Belgian inventor travels to Québec to search for his family, which uncovers a secret history between two seemingly unrelated people.
cast: Olivier Gourmet|Paul Ahmarani|Jean-Pierre Cassel|Claudia Tagbo|Gabriel Arcand|Lorraine Pintal|Arnaud Mouithys|Guy Pion|Janine Sutto|Marie Brassard|Henri Chassé|Jules Philip|Mireille Bailly|Carlo Ferrante|Jean-Luc Couchard|Brigitte Poupart|Frédéric Dompierre|Olivia Le Clercq|Richard Kistabish|Carmen Blais|Jacques Neefs|Benoît Rousseau|Geoffrey Gaquere|Jacques Hébert|Sylvain Scott|Giuseppe Venturelli|Aaron MacDevitt|Ange Mouithys|John Canoe
keywords: inventor|adoption|white male black female relationship|quebec|interracial relationship
title: Congorama
